concept_data.title: European Association of Development Research and Training Institutes

summary: The "European Association of Development Research and Training Institutes" (EADI) is a prominent non-governmental organisation within the EU framework, focusing on enhancing development research and training. EADI serves as a platform for collaboration among various institutes, promoting knowledge exchange and capacity building in development studies. As a redirect to the preferred term "EADI," this concept underscores the association's pivotal role in influencing EU policies related to development cooperation and research initiatives. By fostering partnerships and facilitating dialogue, EADI contributes to the regulatory landscape, ensuring that development strategies align with EU objectives and best practices in the field.
